mapper.select: SELECT d.seq, d.order_seq AS orderSeq, d.item_seq AS itemSeq, d.option_value_seq AS optionValueSeq, d.item_name AS itemName, d.option_value AS optionValue, d.status_code AS statusCode, d.sell_price AS sellPrice, d.org_price AS orgPrice, d.supply_price AS supplyPrice, d.order_cnt AS orderCnt, d.deli_cost AS deliCost, d.deli_prepaid_flag AS deliPrepaidFlag, d.seller_seq AS sellerSeq, d.seller_name AS sellerName, d.c20_date AS c20Date, o.request, o.receiver_name AS receiverName, o.receiver_postcode AS receiverPostcode, o.receiver_addr1 AS receiverAddr1, o.receiver_addr2 AS receiverAddr2, o.receiver_tel AS receiverTel, o.receiver_cell AS receiverCell, ov.free_deli AS freeDeli, ov.event_added AS eventAdded FROM sm_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON (o.seq=d.order_seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_item_option_value ov on (d.option_value_seq=ov.seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN WHERE d.status_code='20' AND d.seller_seq=#{sellerSeq} ORDER BY d.seq DESC

, d.c${statusCode}_date=NOW()
, d.reason=#{reason}
WHERE d.seq=#{seq} AND
d.status_code = '10'
d.status_code = '00'
d.status_code = '10'
d.status_code = '30'
d.status_code != '99'
AND d.seller_seq = #{loginSeq}
AND d.order_seq = (SELECT seq FROM sm_order WHERE seq=d.order_seq AND member_seq=#{loginSeq})
UPDATE sm_order_detail d SET d.status_code='10', d.mod_date=NOW(), d.c10_date=NOW() WHERE d.order_seq=#{value} AND d.status_code='00'
mapper.select: SELECT c.seq, c.order_detail_seq AS orderDetailSeq, c.contents, (SELECT name FROM sm_user WHERE seq=c.login_seq) regName, c.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_order_cs c WHERE c.order_detail_seq=#{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT d.seq, d.status_code AS statusCode FROM sm_order_detail d WHERE d.seq=#{seq} ORDER BY d.seq DESC
SELECT d.seq, d.status_code AS statusCode FROM sm_order_detail d WHERE d.order_seq=#{orderSeq} ORDER BY d.seq DESC

SELECT l.seq, l.order_detail_seq AS orderDetailSeq, l.contents, l.login_seq AS loginSeq, u.name AS loginName, l.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_order_log l LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_user u ON (l.login_seq=u.seq) WHERE l.order_detail_seq=#{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC

mapper.select:
SELECT t.payDate, SUM(t.sell_price) AS sumPrice, SUM(t.supply_price) AS sumSupplyPrice, SUM(t.point) AS POINT, SUM(t.sell_price-t.supply_price) AS profit FROM( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m%d') AS payDate,
DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m') AS payDate,
d.order_seq, SUM(((IFNULL(d.sell_price,0) + IFNULL(d.option_price,0)) * d.order_cnt)) AS sell_price, SUM(IFNULL(d.supply_price,0)) AS supply_price, MAX(IFNULL(h.point,0)) AS POINT FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_point_history h ON(h.order_seq = d.order_seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order o ON(d.order_seq = o.seq) WHERE d.c99_date IS NULL
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{srchDate1} AND #{srchDate2}
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m') BETWEEN #{srchDate1} AND #{srchDate2}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(d.c10_date,'%Y%m'),
d.order_seq
UNION ALL
SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m%d') AS payDate,
DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m') AS payDate,
d.order_seq, -SUM(((IFNULL(d.sell_price,0) + IFNULL(d.option_price,0)) * d.order_cnt)) AS sell_price, -SUM(IFNULL(d.supply_price,0)) AS supply_price, -MAX(IFNULL(h.point,0)) AS POINT FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_point_history h ON(h.order_seq = d.order_seq AND h.status_code = 'C') LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order o ON(d.order_seq = o.seq) WHERE d.c99_date IS NOT NULL
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{srchDate1} AND #{srchDate2}
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m') BETWEEN #{srchDate1} AND #{srchDate2}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(d.c99_date,'%Y%m'),
d.order_seq )t WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY t.payDate ORDER BY t.payDate DESC

SELECT SUM(((d.sell_price * d.order_cnt) + d.deli_cost)) AS totalSellFinishPrice FROM sm_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON(o.seq = d.order_seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_item_option_value v ON(d.option_value_seq = v.seq) WHERE v.seller_seq = #{sellerSeq} GROUP BY v.seller_seq

SELECT SUM(((d.sell_price * d.order_cnt) + d.deli_cost)) AS totalOrderFinishPrice FROM sm_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON(o.seq = d.order_seq) WHERE o.member_seq = #{loginSeq} GROUP BY o.member_seq

SELECT t.totalOrderFinishPrice, u.nickname FROM ( SELECT o.member_seq , SUM(((d.sell_price * d.order_cnt) + d.deli_cost)) AS totalOrderFinishPrice FROM sm_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON(o.seq = d.order_seq) WHERE d.status_code = '55' AND DATE_FORMAT(d.c55_date,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{srchDate1} AND #{srchDate2} GROUP BY o.member_seq ) t LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_user u ON(t.member_seq = u.seq) ORDER BY t.totalOrderFinishPrice DESC LIMIT <= 5

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM sm_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON (o.seq=d.order_seq) WHERE o.seq=#{orderSeq} AND d.status_code > '10' AND d.status_code NOT IN ('90','99')
AND o.member_seq=#{loginSeq}

SELECT d.seq, d.deli_seq AS deliSeq, d.deli_no AS deliNo, c.company_name AS deliCompanyName, c.track_url AS deliTrackUrl, c.complete_msg AS completeMsg FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_deli_company c ON (d.deli_seq=c.seq) WHERE d.status_code='30' AND d.deli_seq NOT IN(19) AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(d.c30_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AND c.track_url IS NOT NULL AND c.complete_msg IS NOT NULL ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT d.seq , d.status_code AS statusCode FROM sm_order_detail d WHERE d.status_code='50' AND DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) > d.c50_date

SELECT seq , receiver_name AS name , receiver_tel AS tel , receiver_cell AS cell , receiver_postcode AS postcode , receiver_addr1 AS addr1 , receiver_addr2 AS addr2 FROM sm_order WHERE seq = (SELECT MAX(seq) FROM sm_order WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq})

SELECT
CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_order_detail WHERE order_seq=#{orderSeq}) = t.cnt THEN t.cnt ELSE 0 END cnt FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM sm_order_detail WHERE order_seq = #{orderSeq} AND status_code IN ('00','10','71','79','90') ) t

SELECT d.seq AS seq, d.item_name AS itemName, d.option_value AS valueName, d.option_value_seq AS optionValueSeq, i.seq AS itemSeq, i.img1 AS img1 FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_item i ON(d.item_seq=i.seq) WHERE d.seq=#{value}

SELECT d.sell_price * d.order_cnt AS sumPrice, d.seller_seq AS sellerSeq, d.tax_code AS taxCode, o.pay_method AS payMethod FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order o ON (d.order_seq=o.seq) WHERE d.seq=#{value} AND d.status_code IN ('00','10','71','79','90')

SELECT MIN(d.seq) AS seq FROM sm_order_detail d INNER JOIN ( SELECT order_seq, seller_seq FROM sm_order_detail WHERE status_code='99' AND deli_prepaid_flag = 'Y' AND deli_cost > 0 AND package_deli_cost > 0 AND seller_seq=#{sellerSeq} AND order_seq=#{orderSeq} ) t ON (d.order_seq=t.order_seq AND d.seller_seq=t.seller_seq) WHERE d.status_code BETWEEN '10' AND '90' AND deli_prepaid_flag = 'Y' AND d.deli_cost = 0 AND d.package_deli_cost > 0
UPDATE sm_order_detail SET deli_cost=0 WHERE status_code='99' AND seq=#{seq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_order_detail d LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order o ON(d.order_seq=o.seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_member m ON (o.member_seq=m.seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_member_group g ON (m.group_seq=g.seq) WHERE o.old_order_id IS NULL AND (o.np_pay_flag = 'Y' OR (o.np_pay_flag = 'N' AND d.status_code != '99'))
AND o.member_seq=#{loginSeq}
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{searchDate1}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{searchDate2}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.np_pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{npPayDate1}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{npPayDate2}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND o.seq=#{orderSeq}
AND o.member_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberName},'%')
AND o.member_seq IN (SELECT seq FROM sm_user WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberId},'%') AND type_code='C')
AND o.receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{receiverName},'%')
AND o.pay_method LIKE CONCAT(#{payMethod},'%')
AND o.np_pay_flag = #{npPayFlag}
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{groupName},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sm_order_detail WHERE order_seq=#{value} AND status_code BETWEEN '70' AND '90'

SELECT CONCAT( (SELECT item_name FROM sm_order_detail WHERE seq=t.min_seq), CASE WHEN t.cnt>1 THEN CONCAT(' 외 ', t.cnt-1, '건') ELSE '' END ) itemNames FROM ( SELECT d.order_seq, COUNT(*) cnt, min(d.seq) min_seq FROM sm_order_detail d WHERE d.status_code != '99' AND d.order_seq=#{value} )t

SELECT s.sales_email FROM ( SELECT order_seq, seller_seq FROM sm_order_detail WHERE order_seq=#{orderSeq} AND status_code='10' AND c20_date IS NULL GROUP BY order_seq, seller_seq ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_seller s ON (t1.seller_seq=s.seq)
